full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THOG MAR BLO SBYONG GI DRIS LAN BRNGA DON GSAL BA'I ME LONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,('DI NI SPOBS PA DGE BA CAN, ,BSHES GNYEN BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS, ,DRIS PA'I KHAN DU GYI NA BA, DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS PHUL, ,DZA YANTU,, ,,AOm SVA STI, ,TSUL 'DI BSTAN SGRON NO MING HANG GI SLOB, ,MKHYEN YANGS DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG GIS, ,CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL BA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE PAR DU LEGS PAR BSGRUBS, ,RNAM SANG 'DI'I MTSON DUS GSUM DGE TSOGS MTHUS, ,TSE RABS KUN TU DAL 'BYOR RTEN BRGYUD DE, ,THEG MCHOG BLA MAS DGYES BZHIN RJES BZUNG NAS, ,SA LAM BGROD PA MYUR DU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG , ,,)
author_simple: DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS,
